meanings.definition: The act of moving material with a shovel.
meanings.sent1: Shoveling can be hard work, but it keeps our driveway clean.
meanings.sent2: I saw Tom doing some shoveling outside his house.
meanings.sent3: Why did the snowman refuse to do any shoveling? He didn't want to lose his cool!
meanings.sent4: Her determination was like shoveling through a mountain of challenges.
meanings.sent5: The sound of shoveling echoed through the quiet neighborhood.

meanings.definition: To clear or remove material with a shovel.
meanings.sent1: We will be shoveling the snow off the sidewalk tomorrow.
meanings.sent2: She was shoveling dirt into the wheelbarrow.
meanings.sent3: The pirate captain decided to start shoveling the treasure into his ship.
meanings.sent4: Shoveling through the paperwork, she finally found the missing document.
meanings.sent5: The team was shoveling gravel to create a path in the garden.
